2. Data description
Consider converting your data to open formats, e.g. mzML for mass spectrometry data. You can find guidance here: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/proteomics
7. Data sharing
International data repositories exist for your kind of data. Have a look at the page above, or this one: https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases
